mapper.insert: insert into board values(SEQ_BOARD_NO.nextval, #{memberId}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, default, default, default)
mapper.select: select count(*) from board where DEL_YN = 'N'

select M.ADMIN_YN, B.BOARD_NO, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_COUNT, B.BOARD_DATE, B.DEL_YN from board B join member M on B.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID where B.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY M.ADMIN_YN DESC, B.BOARD_DATE DESC
select * from board where DEL_YN = 'N' and BOARD_NO=#{boardNo}
